author: PFCal-dev
body:
Main changes:
* Add ntuplizer modules
* Add a TriggerCell data format
* Add new type of trigger cell selection in the front-end
* Add trigger cell energy calibration
* Produce the HGCal trigger geometry with an ESProducer
* Update the trigger module mapping for the V7 and V8 HGCal geometry. Depends on external cms-data/L1Trigger-L1THGCal#3, but tests can be run without these data (HGCal trigger is currently commented out in SimL1Emulator_cff)
title: HGCal trigger updates
